short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open source text converter designed to help you read faster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are struggling to read texts faster on the internet, this might be a useful tool to improve your reading speed!

The Speed Reading Chrome extension is developed by an EdTech startup, QJ Learn, that is based in Singapore. QJ Learn also provides other products and services like tuition, coaching, Notion templates and study tools. You can check them out here: https://www.qjlearn.com/

How it works is very simple. The extension will read the texts on you browser and format the first few letters to be bold so your brain can auto-complete the rest of the texts while reading.

Toggle button: Toggle the extension on or off
Enable/disable auto-apply: Enabling will help you apply the extension to all the web pages

There is no solid research to justify which group of people can benefit most from the tool yet, however, if you think it can help you read faster, do give it a try!
